con:testCase.name: BadCases-DEV-DEBIT-MSISDN-Deregistered
con:testCase.con:description: Tests clawback for deregistered msisdn. Expected result base on CR: SR50945 for DRC It must be not possible to assign debit transaction to msisdn, not registered by direct debit (ppit) Amount from bank transactions (CAMT054-Credit) can be assigned to registered and not registered msisdn!

con:elements.con:expectedValue: PPIT-CustomerCaseServices.notifyAboutBankTransaction: Return response for request with externalContractID: - ${#TestCase#ContractID}
PPIT-CustomerCaseServices.notifyAboutBankTransaction: Return response for request with externalContractID: - ${#TestCase#ContractID}
PPIT-CustomerCaseServices.notifyAboutBankTransaction: Return response for request with externalContractID: - ${#TestCase#ContractID}
